definitions.definition: Causing attraction ; having the quality of attracting by inherent force .
Having the power of charming or alluring by agreeable qualities; enticing .
Pleasing or appealing to the senses , especially of a potential romantic partner.
examples: He is an attractive fellow with a trim figure.

main_definition: Causing attraction ; having the quality of attracting by inherent force .
secondary_definitions: Having the power of charming or alluring by agreeable qualities; enticing .
Pleasing or appealing to the senses , especially of a potential romantic partner.
